text: for a long time I think there was a
sense of it just can't happen here no
one can assume that oh this will never
happened to my school anymore now I come
to school thinking yeah it could happen
today
[Music]
we are the guardians of these young
people in the schools I feel that in a
way we've been put on the frontlines
whether we like it or not I never ever
could have could have imagined that part
of my job description would be that I
may be asked to give my life to protect
my children they're looking to me to say
is this why is this happening do you
think this will happen to us will I be
okay I don't have those answers
something can fall in the hallway and
make a loud bang and that is something
that gathers attention you know I go
into different classrooms and I'm like
mm-hmm yeah where would I stand where
would I be if something started
happening I'm looking around and
noticing well this classroom wouldn't be
very survivable we spend an inordinate
amount of time on safety drills that we
never did before you know if you don't
practice I think it is more difficult to
handle a crisis situation there is a
balance of especially when you're
working with young kids of you don't
want to freak them out and make them
feel scared to come to school every day
as teachers we had something called a
leash training in Ohio that's it's an
active shooter training where they teach
you things like how to barricade a door
with desks so in light of the recent
shootings
I took a concealed-weapons class I
thought about a club or you know
something that would not be easily
identified as something for self-defense
all the teachers have walkie-talkies I'm
happiest when they give me a key to the
school the classroom door because that
means I can lock it having the doors
locked
throughout the day is protocol it's not
an overwhelming pervasive fear every day
but it does sort of you know make me
question those situations where it could
go either way I don't think you can ever
really know when
what you're gonna do in a crisis
situation so my hope is I would put my
students first and you know do
everything I can to protect them
